mapper.select: SELECT sr.ID, sr.STATION_CODE, sr.STATION_NAME, sr.START_TIME, sr.END_TIME, sr.CREATE_DATE, u.NAME AS CREATE_BY FROM SYS_STATION_ROLE sr LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u on u.ID=sr.CREATE_BY WHERE sr.DEL_FLAG='0' ORDER BY sr.CREATE_DATE desc

SELECT sr.ID, sr.STATION_CODE, sr.STATION_NAME, sr.START_TIME, sr.END_TIME FROM SYS_STATION_ROLE sr WHERE sr.DEL_FLAG='0' AND START_TIME=to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND END_TIME=to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT sr.ID, sr.STATION_CODE, sr.STATION_NAME, sr.START_TIME, sr.END_TIME, sr.CREATE_DATE, u.NAME AS CREATE_BY FROM SYS_STATION_ROLE sr LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u on u.ID=sr.CREATE_BY WHERE sr.DEL_FLAG='0' AND sr.ID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM SYS_STATION_ROLE WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND sysdate >= START_TIME AND END_TIME >= sysdate
select count(1) from SYS_STATION_ROLE WHERE DEL_FLAG='0' AND START_TIME>=#{startDate} AND #{endDate}>=END_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_STATION_ROLE (ID, STATION_CODE, STATION_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{stationCode}, #{stationName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{createBy}, sysdate)
mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_STATION_ROLE SET
STATION_CODE=#{stationCode},
STATION_NAME=#{stationName},
START_TIME=#{startDate},
END_TIME=#{endDate},
UPDATE_BY=#{updateBy}, UPDATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE ID=#{id}
